# Directory Contents

In this directory, we provide code for various components of the manuscript *Context Tree Classification and Clustering*.  Please refer to the following files: 

1. For code regarding the simulation study in section 3 and VLMC dissimilarity metrics -- please see *Simulation-Walkthrough.md*

2. For code regarding the prosodic text encoding algorithm, please see *Prosodic-Encoding-Walkthrough.md*
